subNodes.conversationText: root
I told you they looked liked Charnians...
Yes Pegel, I believe you were right.
Hello there fellow Charnians.  I thought we knew all the surviving Charnians, but I don't believe we have ever met before.
We came from across the Great Grimstan Mountains.
The Grimstan Mountains?  They are much to high even for me to cross over.  Did you come through the old Mountain Dwarves' passage?
Yes, we did.
Oh, how wonderful...so there are surviving Charnians who made it through to the Western Lands.
Yes, quite a few actually.
We thought they might all have been destroyed bu Zorn and the witch.  So, what brings you here?
We are on a mission to rescue my father and his friends.
I take it you are heading for Zorn's castle?
Yes, do you know anything that may be useful for us?
Of course, no one seems to pay attention to us so we observe and overhear many things.
May we ask you a few questions?
Please, ask away.
My father, Adwen, and a few others were taken to Zorn's prisons, do you know anything about this?
Your father is Adwen?  He was a good friend, very kind to us talking beasts.
It was about a year ago that we saw him and a few others being carried away towards Zorn's castle.
We haven't heard from them since, but the word is that they are still alive in Zorn's prisons.
Thank you, may we ask another question?
Please, ask away.
Can you tell us anything about Zorn's return?
It was a little less than a year ago that the rumors began.  We didn't believe them, of course, but a few months ago, right here, we actually saw him and the witch.
He was on a black horse in his full armor.  The witch, who was very beautiful and tall, was riding a large white horse.
They had a small group with them of zornians and a fire giant.
We briefly overheard them discussing their plans to attack a vampire couple that blocked the main path to the Western Lands.
They were just waiting for the collapsed parts of the passage to be excavated.
That's all we heard.
Thank you, may we ask another question?
Please, ask away.
What do you know about this witch?
Rumor has it that she is not from this world.  She is very beautiful and quite tall.  Some believe that Zorn summoned her into this world.
Know one really knows for sure, but we do know that she is as cruel as she is beautiful.
Life for the Charnians has become almost unbearable ever since she arrived.
Thank you, may we ask another question?
Please, ask away.
Can you tell us about the recent activities of Zorn's minions?
Many years after Zorn was banished to the Dark Island, his followers and evil creations began to divide into clans and war among themselves.
It was a little over a year ago that we noticed a much more active and unified forces among the many clans of Zorn's creatures.
It seems as if someone had risen to power and reunited all the clans for an evil purpose.
It was not too long after this that the rumors of a powerful witch and the return of Zorn began.
Thank you, may we ask another question?
Please, ask away.
I don't think we have anymore questions, thank you for your insight.
Take care and hopefully we shall meet again under better circumstances.
I hope so, take care.
